# Pacific hake `r yr` Version `r version` Request models

```{r paste("dirs-", yr, "-version-", version, "-sensitivity-models"), echo = FALSE}
links <- "https://github.com/pacific-hake/hake-assessment/blob/947de55a5943aa6ca471e7e1077720c3c19682be/R/model-setup.R#L298"

df <- tibble(`Model Name` = c("01-request-01-remove-age-1-index"),
             `Last changed by` = c("Chris"),
             `Last changed date` = c("2022-12-13"),
             Description = c("Remove the age-1 index from the base model"),
             `Code link` = c("link to loading code")) %>%
  mutate(`Code link` = cell_spec(`Code link`, "html", link = links))

kbl(df, format = "html", escape = FALSE) |> 
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover", "condensed", "responsive"),
                font_size = 16) |> 
  column_spec(1, width = "20em") |> 
  column_spec(2, width = "15em") |> 
  column_spec(3, width = "15em") |> 
  column_spec(4, width = "30em") |> 
  column_spec(5, width = "20em")
```
